name: Illuminate (GoogolPlanck)
description:
A game where everything was made by using lights.

The world has fallen into darkness, you are the last light illuminate all the darkness.

Control:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Power Ups:

  • Red Light: Damage Upgrade
  • Yellow Light: Heal
  • Green Light: Movement Speed Upgrade
  • Blue Light: Rate of Fire Upgrade
  • Purple Light: Rapid Fire (Hold LMB) for 10s

Credit: 

SCP-x6x (Hopes) by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/6736-scp-x6x-hopes-
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

This game was made for Untitled Game Jam #38 (Theme: Minimalism)
